Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GUI extends Object implements UI
This class manages the GUIApplication, which stores and displays the graphical interface, via the GUIController class. It serves as a driver between the client and the GUI proper.

      Specified by:
      requestServerInfo in interface UI
      Parameters:

      defaultPort - the default port to connect to.
      Returns:

      Description copied from interface: UI
      Displays the game winners. Then, ends the game.
      Specified by:
      displayWinners in interface UI
      Parameters:
      winner - the tower color of the winner of thi match.
      winners - the nicknames of the winners of this match.
      losers - the nicknames of the losers of this match.

    • sendSelection

      public void sendSelection(UserAction userAction)
      Sends the user action given through the client. Then, disables all GUI elements to avoid errors. The elements will have to be enabled again when a server response has been received.
      Parameters:
      userAction - the user action to send.

    • notifySetupInput

      public void notifySetupInput()
      Awakes the GUI if it was waiting for a setup input.
